Package org.mvplugins.multiverse.core.utils.position

Class FaceDirection

java.lang.Object
org.mvplugins.multiverse.core.utils.position.FaceDirection
@AvailableSince("5.3") public class FaceDirection extends Object
Represents a direction to face, defined by pitch and yaw.
Since:
5.3

    • FaceDirection

      @AvailableSince("5.3") public FaceDirection(PositionNumber pitch, PositionNumber yaw)
      Creates a new FaceDirection with the specified pitch and yaw.
      Parameters:
      pitch - The pitch (vertical angle).
      yaw - The yaw (horizontal angle).
      Since:
      5.3

  • Method Details

    • ofAbsolute

      @AvailableSince("5.3") public static FaceDirection ofAbsolute(double pitch, double yaw)
      Creates a FaceDirection with absolute pitch and yaw.
      Parameters:
      pitch - The absolute pitch (vertical angle).
      yaw - The absolute yaw (horizontal angle).
      Returns:
      A new FaceDirection instance with the specified absolute pitch and yaw.
      Since:
      5.3

    • ofLocation

      @AvailableSince("5.3") public static FaceDirection ofLocation(org.bukkit.Location location)
      Gets the pitch and yaw from a Bukkit Location to create an FaceDirection with absolute values.
      Parameters:
      location - The Bukkit Location to convert.
      Returns:
      A new FaceDirection instance representing the direction of the given location.
      Since:
      5.3

    • fromString

      @AvailableSince("5.3") public static FaceDirection fromString(String directionStr) throws PositionParseException
      Parses a FaceDirection from a string representation. The expected format is "<pitch>:<yaw>" for absolute pitch and yaw.
      Relative pitch and yaw can be specified using the '~' prefix, e.g., "~:~5".
      Parameters:
      directionStr - The string representation of the direction.
      Returns:
      A new FaceDirection instance parsed from the string.
      Throws:
      PositionParseException - If the string format is invalid.
      Since:
      5.3

    • getPitch

      @AvailableSince("5.3") public PositionNumber getPitch()
      Gets the pitch component of this FaceDirection.
      Returns:
      The pitch number representation.
      Since:
      5.3

    • getYaw

      @AvailableSince("5.3") public PositionNumber getYaw()
      Gets the yaw component of this FaceDirection.
      Returns:
      The yaw number representation.
      Since:
      5.3

    • augmentBukkitLocation

      @AvailableSince("5.3") public void augmentBukkitLocation(org.bukkit.Location base)
      Applies this FaceDirection to a given Bukkit Location, modifying its pitch and yaw.
      Relative pitch and yaw will be offset based on the current values in the Location.
      Parameters:
      base - The Bukkit Location to modify.
      Since:
      5.3

      public String toString()
